document_data.name: Kyrill Nederlok
document_data.mainbody: '''Marshal Kyrill Nederlok''' was a general of the [[Flaming Fist]] mercenary company and served the organization since its founding. He was highly respected among his soldiers and superiors, and was wellâ€“well trusted by the founder of the Fist, [[Council of Four|Grand Duke]] [[Eltan]].{{Cite web/Siege of Dragonspear: Field Report|24}}
document_data.Personality: He preferred [[Winter Wine]] over other types.{{Cite web/Siege of Dragonspear: Field Report|15}}
document_data.History:
Kyrill Nederlok first joined the Flaming Fist as a mercenary at the group's founding in the {{YearlinkName|1345}}. In time, he rose through the ranks and was promoted to marshal around 
the {{YearlinkName|1362}}.

During the [[War of the Shining Crusade]] of [[1368 DR]], Marshal Nederlok was tasked with leading the Fist soldiers that contributed to the [[Coalition|army of the Coalition]].
